response.overview: 'Erased by Putin' shows the Federal Security Service (FSB) stalking a long-time activist and organizer of St. Petersburg Pride; the arrest and dismissal of a lesbian architect in Moscow; the escape of a drag artist detained in one of the many raids ordered by the Kremlin; and the loneliness and anguish of a young agender person who began their transition in secret 20 months ago in Putin's Russia, despite it being prohibited.
response.title: Borrados por Putin
